text: Undercurrent is a 1946 American crime drama movie directed by Vincente Minnelli and was based on the 1944 story You Were There by Thelma Strabel. It stars Katharine Hepburn, Robert Taylor, Robert Mitchum, Edmund Gwenn, Marjorie Main, Jayne Meadows, Dan Tobin, Leigh Whipper and was distributed by Metro- Goldwyn-Mayer. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1946 crime drama movies Category:1940s American crime drama movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Vincente Minnelli
title: Undercurrent (1946 movie)
